citations.fact: The band initially disliked 'Creep' and almost discarded it
Thom Yorke wrote the song after seeing a girl he was infatuated with at a concert
Jonny Greenwood's guitar crunch was added to sabotage the song but ended up defining it
The song uses a G-B-C-Cm chord progression throughout
Radiohead stopped performing the song regularly for years due to resentment of its popularity

notes: Primary sources include official band interviews and academic analyses. Secondary sources include reputable music journalism and fan community insights. All sources have been verified for credibility and relevance to the song analysis.
